course_title: Senior Seminar: Building a Billion $ Company
seats: Seats: Maximum Enrollment: 50 / Seats Avail: 4Waitlist Total: 0
class_notes:
Class meets on Mondays from 5:30-7:30 pm on the following dates: 9/13, 10/4, 10/18, 11/1, 11/29, alternate date: 12/6. Alternate dates are only used if the instructor or the school has an emergency that causes one of the scheduled dates to be canceled (they will not be held as makeup dates for a missed class).  When signing up for a course, please remember to keep alternate dates free also.


For any student aspiring to build, join or invest in a landmark company, come learn from CEOs currently tackling the issues faced at each phase. Session 1 - 'From Inception to $10M'; Session 2 - '$10M to $100M'; Session 3 - '$100M to $250M'; Session 4 - '$250M to $750M'; Session 5 - 'Breaking $1B and accelerating through it.'
Format: Start of the class will be a speaker sharing learnings and issues at the specific stage, then as a class we will tackle a case study of a key decision the CEO must make to succeed. Be ready to envision building a billion dollar company, and expect to be better prepared post-seminar. You will also meet some of the best entrepreneurs in the Atlanta region.
course_description: Senior seminar courses fall outside the scope of traditional academic coursework, and instead allow students to learn from and interact with experienced practitioners, and to develop industry-specific insights, fine-tune career skills, and increase professional exposure.
prerequisites: This section is reserved for students in the BBA program.
schedule_location: M 5:30pm-7:30pm in Goizueta Foundation Ctr W320
